products.title: Thermal Plus City Grey Energy Saving Roller Blind
products.description: This dark and dusky city grey blind has a sophisticated, contemporary look backed up by incredible energy saving properties giving you more bang for your buck. The stylish fabric is coated with a special thermal layer that insulates your home and gives your radiators a break, so this dark and dusky city grey blind has a sophisticated, contemporary look backed up by incredible energy saving properties giving you more bang for your buck.

products.title: Thermal Luxe Dimout Charcoal Roller Blind
products.description: Stark, striking and beautiful, the solid black shade of this thermal luxe charcoal roller blind is balanced by a lightness that comes from its soft, linen-mix fabric.
